verses.verse: Then Eliphaz <S%H464><s%> the Temanite <S%H8489><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%>,
Can a man <S%H1397><s%> be profitable <S%H5532><s%> unto God <S%H410><s%>, as <S%H3588><s%> he that is wise <S%H7919><s%> may be profitable unto himself <S%H5532><s%>?
Is it any pleasure <S%H2656><s%> to the Almighty <S%H7706><s%>, that you are righteous <S%H6663><s%>? or is it gain <S%H1215><s%> to him <S%H1870><s%>, that you make your ways perfect <S%H8552><s%>?
Will he reprove <S%H3198><s%> you for fear <S%H3374><s%> of you <S%H935><s%>? will he enter with you into judgment <S%H4941><s%>?
Is not your wickedness <S%H7451><s%> great <S%H7227><s%>? and your iniquities <S%H5771><s%> infinite <S%H7093><s%>?
For you have taken a pledge <S%H2254><s%> from your brother <S%H251><s%> for nothing <S%H2600><s%>, and stripped <S%H6584><s%> the naked <S%H6174><s%> of their clothing <S%H899><s%>.
You have not given water <S%H4325><s%> to the weary <S%H5889><s%> to drink <S%H8248><s%>, and you have withheld <S%H4513><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> from the hungry <S%H7457><s%>.
But as for the mighty <S%H2220><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, he had the earth <S%H776><s%>; and the honorable man <S%H5375><s%> lived in it <S%H3427><s%>.
You have sent <S%H7971><s%> widows <S%H490><s%> away empty <S%H7387><s%>, and the arms <S%H2220><s%> of the fatherless <S%H3490><s%> have been broken <S%H1792><s%>.
Therefore snares <S%H6341><s%> are round about <S%H5439><s%> you <S%H6597><s%>, and sudden fear <S%H6343><s%> troubles you <S%H926><s%>;
Or darkness <S%H2822><s%>, that you can not see <S%H7200><s%>; and abundance <S%H8229><s%> of waters <S%H4325><s%> cover you <S%H3680><s%>.
Is not God <S%H433><s%> in the height <S%H1363><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>? and behold <S%H7200><s%> the height <S%H7218><s%> of the stars <S%H3556><s%>, how high they are <S%H7311><s%>!
And you say <S%H559><s%>, How does God <S%H410><s%> know <S%H3045><s%>? can he judge <S%H8199><s%> through the dark cloud <S%H6205><s%>?
Thick clouds <S%H5645><s%> are a covering <S%H5643><s%> to him <S%H7200><s%>, that he sees not <S%H1980><s%>; and he walks in the circuit <S%H2329><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>.
Have you marked <S%H8104><s%> the old <S%H5769><s%> way <S%H734><s%> which wicked <S%H205><s%> men <S%H4962><s%> have trodden <S%H1869><s%>?
Which were cut down <S%H7059><s%> out of time <S%H6256><s%>, whose foundation <S%H3247><s%> was overflown <S%H3332><s%> with a flood <S%H5104><s%>:
Which said <S%H559><s%> unto God <S%H410><s%>, Depart <S%H5493><s%> from us <S%H7706><s%>: and what can the Almighty do for them <S%H6466><s%>?
Yet he filled <S%H4390><s%> their houses <S%H1004><s%> with good <S%H2896><s%> things <S%H6098><s%>: but the counsel of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> is far from me <S%H7368><s%>.
The righteous <S%H6662><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H8055><s%>, and are glad: and the innocent <S%H5355><s%> laugh them to scorn <S%H3932><s%>.
Whereas <S%H518><s%> our substance <S%H7009><s%> is not cut down <S%H3582><s%>, but the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of them the fire <S%H784><s%> consumes <S%H398><s%>.
Acquaint <S%H5532><s%> now yourself with him <S%H7999><s%>, and be at peace: thereby good <S%H2896><s%> shall come unto you <S%H935><s%>.
Receive <S%H3947><s%>, I pray you <S%H8451><s%>, the law from his mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and lay up <S%H7760><s%> his words <S%H561><s%> in your heart <S%H3824><s%>.

If you return <S%H7725><s%> to the Almighty <S%H7706><s%>, you shall be built up <S%H1129><s%>, you shall put away <S%H7368><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from your tabernacles <S%H168><s%>.
Then shall you lay up <S%H7896><s%> gold <S%H1220><s%> as <S%H5921><s%> dust <S%H6083><s%>, and the gold of Ophir <S%H211><s%> as the stones <S%H6697><s%> of the brooks <S%H5158><s%>.
Yes <S%H7706><s%>, the Almighty shall be your defense <S%H1220><s%>, and you shall have plenty <S%H8443><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>.
For then shall you have your delight <S%H6026><s%> in the Almighty <S%H7706><s%>, and shall lift up <S%H5375><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> unto God <S%H433><s%>.
You shall make your prayer <S%H6279><s%> unto him <S%H8085><s%>, and he shall hear you <S%H7999><s%>, and you shall pay your vows <S%H5088><s%>.
You shall also decree <S%H1504><s%> a thing <S%H562><s%>, and it shall be established <S%H6965><s%> unto you <S%H216><s%>: and the light shall shine <S%H5050><s%> upon your ways <S%H1870><s%>.
When men are cast down <S%H8213><s%>, then you shall say <S%H559><s%>, There is lifting up <S%H1466><s%>; and he shall save <S%H3467><s%> the humble <S%H7807><s%> person <S%H5869><s%>.
He shall deliver <S%H4422><s%> the island <S%H336><s%> of the innocent <S%H5355><s%>: and it is delivered <S%H4422><s%> by the pureness <S%H1252><s%> of your hands <S%H3709><s%>.
